name: Space Odyssey (itch) (Snippeeey)
description:
Univers This game take place in a galaxy very distant from ours , you incarnate a space soldiers send to destroy an ennemy armada alone  Control To play you need to have a Xbox controller regardless of the model  To move you need your both stick and RB or LB to move letf to right  to Shoot you have to press X  You can toggle between camera by pressing the Right stick button (inGame it say the left but its definitly the right one) To shoot you need to lock an ennemy or an asteroid  Press RT to accelerate and LT to decelerate

Music made by Mahito Yokota
